Description: 2018 Custom Shop Gibson Les Paul '58 Made to Measure Custom Color (washed cherry with color sample) Guitar is 8lbs on the scale, with a real vintage color and figured top. In person, looks like a '58/'59 authentic top and color. Resonant acoustically, sings through my marshall. Clean and dirty you have it here. Excellent feeling ‘59 neck, very smooth. Up and down the fretboard notes ring like a bell and sustain is right where you want it to be. Beautiful dark East Indian rosewood. Every appointment on this piece is excellent. Specs are the following: -Mahogany neck hand picked -True historic reissue Carmelita Neck CC#37 ('59 profile) -Scale length- 24-3/4 -Nylon nut -reissue inlays -fret wire reissue -Mahogany body hand picked light weight -'59 Carmelita tilted routing -59 drilling and dimensions -hand picked two piece maple top -hide glue construction -body binding: -.04 cream fingerboard -.09 cream body -hardware -aged nickle -kluson machine head tuners -tailpiece light weight w/long stud,anchor -abr-1 non wire -jackplate-true historic reissue -truss rod cover True historic from advanced -pickguard true historic r9 -knobs top hat volume and tone -mounting rings-True historic cream -switch tip-true historic amber -backplates-CS and reissue medallion -pickups: -Custombucker TH bridge and neck pickups -finish Washed cherry (with color sample TH aniline red back neck and rims amber tint logo on head stock guitar will be packed with the original lacquered Lifton case, paperwork, certs. shipped in original box insured. Sold as is, please ask any questions before bidding thank you.
Title: 2018 Gibson Custom Shop Les Paul M2M Custom Cherry Burst 1958 1959 Carmelita
